channel.title: Github on Daniel Leong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Daniel Leong's Blog

item.title: Github repo for China's Major Tech Firm
item.description: Recently, I would browse through Github and notice how these companies have started to show up. Here is a list that I have compiled. Will update this as I find new ones. Company Github Org Link Crunchbase Profile Alibaba https://github.com/alibaba https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/alibaba Baidu https://github.com/baidu https://www.
